member.summary: Gets the hash code for the contents of the array since the default hash code for an array is unique even if the contents are the same.
member.remarks: See Jon Skeet (C# MVP) response in the StackOverflow thread http://stackoverflow.com/questions/263400/what-is-the-best-algorithm-for-an-overridden-system-object-gethashcode
member.param: The array to generate a hash code for.
member.returns: The hash code for the values in the array.

member.summary: Compares the contents of both arrays to see if they are equal. This depends on typeparameter T having a valid override for Equals().
